channel.title: Face the Nation on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Face the Nation on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CBS News Changes Interview Policy for ‘Face the Nation’ After Backlash for Edit to Kristi Noem Segment
item.description: The Sunday public affairs show will now run live or live to tape interviews, after an edit to an interview with the Homeland Security Secretary drew pushback.
